title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: Crypto exchange incorporated in St Vincent and Grenadines, BlueBit.io, which entered the market in spring this year, has listed Shiba Inu, according to a recent tweet of Shannon Bray, a politician, candidate for US Senate from the Libertarian Party who will run an election in November.Read more on U.Today https://u.today/shib-listed-by-yet-another-crypto-exchange-details

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: How is this a game changer, though?Never heard of BlueBit.io, yet I am a regular trader. It was introduced just in 2019.Quote from: waONE on August 13, 2022, 03:07:58 PMBluebit is one of the commodity markets, cryptocurrencies and forex, How so? Can you name any commodities and forex markets in that exchange?Quote from: waONE on August 13, 2022, 03:07:58 PMof course their market and their volume is much bigger and will probably be the biggest market,You have no idea on what you are taking about.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Is that politician taking advantage the hype with SHIB? What’s the importance of this listing where in fact SHIB is already listed in top exchanges? I can consider this as part of the hype as well considering the market is getting better right now and seriously, we know the hype for meme token is still here and with this as a proof, we should be more careful. Well, usage should be improve so they can rise again, but if its all about exchange listing then I think its not that big.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on August 13, 2022, 09:29:09 PMIs that politician taking advantage the hype with SHIB? What’s the importance of this listing where in fact SHIB is already listed in top exchanges? I can consider this as part of the hype as well considering the market is getting better right now and seriously, we know the hype for meme token is still here and with this as a proof, we should be more careful. Well, usage should be improve so they can rise again, but if its all about exchange listing then I think its not that big.Yeah, I was surprised why the politician announced this one, is he in relation with Shiba? or the exchange itself?Or maybe his intention is to let people know that he is going to accept Shiba as donations for his political campaigns? Lol. Anyhow, the exchange is fairly new and there are more exchanges with reputation that has listed Shiba. So all I'm saying that it's better to trade it to other exchanges than to test your self against a new one like the one mentioned by the OP. Of course it will be good for Shiba's liquidity, but it doesn't matter at this point, so my advise is be very careful of this new exchange.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on August 13, 2022, 09:29:09 PMIs that politician taking advantage the hype with SHIB? What’s the importance of this listing where in fact SHIB is already listed in top exchanges? What can we expect from a politician? Not unless he/she a crypto advocate since then and want’s to improve the regulations with cryptocurrency but if not, I guess its all about the hype and politics. I’m not familiar with that exchange OP, is it bigger than Binance? If not then I believe it will have no impact in the price of SHIB and probably an ordinary news for the investors. Meme token might still active today but if they remain like this, probably they will just remain as a meme token with no usage.

comments.author: Aliem Nur
comments.body: one of the meme coins that will trend again may be Shiba and Doge, because these two coins even without developers will always run, this is the power of meme coins, by listing on the exchange then SHIB really has good news, buy and hold for the short term

comments.author: Pterosaur
comments.body: Quote from: Aliem Nur on August 13, 2022, 11:08:46 PMone of the meme coins that will trend again may be Shiba and Doge, because these two coins even without developers will always run, this is the power of meme coins, by listing on the exchange then SHIB really has good news, buy and hold for the short termWhy are you advising people to buy Shib for the short term? It's not as if this project is going to 3x in the short term, if you aren't ready to buy and hold for long term do not go near Shiba inu because this project have already gives the most impossible returns to its investors, any bog move in the short term is a lie.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Quote from: Aliem Nur on August 13, 2022, 11:08:46 PMone of the meme coins that will trend again may be Shiba and Doge, because these two coins even without developers will always run, this is the power of meme coins, by listing on the exchange then SHIB really has good news, buy and hold for the short termIt's better if you told elon to always creating more and more tweet again about meme token. It's purely hype and no power at all. There's no strong fundamental between meme token. Elon musk is the reason why doge and shiba become so popular unlike another crypto in the market. The era for meme token already gone. That's what i know from the new trend in the market. forget it. Meme trend has gone. It will not comeback again.

comments.author: Pterosaur
comments.body: Quote from: bittick on August 14, 2022, 05:51:58 AMQuote from: Aliem Nur on August 13, 2022, 11:08:46 PMone of the meme coins that will trend again may be Shiba and Doge, because these two coins even without developers will always run, this is the power of meme coins, by listing on the exchange then SHIB really has good news, buy and hold for the short termIt's better if you told elon to always creating more and more tweet again about meme token. It's purely hype and no power at all. There's no strong fundamental between meme token. Elon musk is the reason why doge and shiba become so popular unlike another crypto in the market. The era for meme token already gone. That's what i know from the new trend in the market. forget it. Meme trend has gone. It will not comeback again. I bet no one saw that Doge coin pump coming, you won't be saying this if you owned 1 million doge coin at that time, just because something looks like it will fail doesn't mean it should fail because people want it to fail, it won't hurt to hold 10 million Shib either its just 100$ to 120$ right now.

comments.author: Reid
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on August 13, 2022, 09:29:09 PMIs that politician taking advantage the hype with SHIB? Could be. He will need every support he could get and even if that means supporting a memecoin without any use case at all. He knows what he is doing and I admire that. He also knows what is happening in social media especially Twitter where Shiba's heart is positioned. But, there's no assurance it will be an impact to his candidacy. Quote from: goaldigger on August 13, 2022, 09:29:09 PMWhat’s the importance of this listing where in fact SHIB is already listed in top exchanges? I can consider this as part of the hype as well considering the market is getting better right now and seriously, we know the hype for meme token is still here and with this as a proof, we should be more careful. Well, usage should be improve so they can rise again, but if its all about exchange listing then I think its not that big.It's not, that's true. Listing today is just a normal thing unlike before. "When Binance?"  With the wide competition of exchange out there, they could list it anywhere and say it's a good thing.

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: Bluebit is shit exchanger. No potential whale traders here.  And it's still not that popular an exchange . SHIB Token being listed here will not have any positive effect on SHIB. SHIB is listed on major exchanges like Binance, FTX, Ku-coin. op  Why are you so happy to be listed on a shit exchange like Bluebit?  And why do you think a new topic should be opened about it?

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Pterosaur on August 14, 2022, 06:56:01 AMQuote from: bittick on August 14, 2022, 05:51:58 AMQuote from: Aliem Nur on August 13, 2022, 11:08:46 PMone of the meme coins that will trend again may be Shiba and Doge, because these two coins even without developers will always run, this is the power of meme coins, by listing on the exchange then SHIB really has good news, buy and hold for the short termIt's better if you told elon to always creating more and more tweet again about meme token. It's purely hype and no power at all. There's no strong fundamental between meme token. Elon musk is the reason why doge and shiba become so popular unlike another crypto in the market. The era for meme token already gone. That's what i know from the new trend in the market. forget it. Meme trend has gone. It will not comeback again. I bet no one saw that Doge coin pump coming, you won't be saying this if you owned 1 million doge coin at that time, just because something looks like it will fail doesn't mean it should fail because people want it to fail, it won't hurt to hold 10 million Shib either its just 100$ to 120$ right now. It will still not convince anyone to invest in SHIB especially because they know it's a meme token hyped again without a real use case. Dogecoin I think has somewhat created its own use case when we kept using it in casinos. But Shib is not. The only hope it gave to users is that there is development going on despite it being a meme coin. It was recently added on the notable exchange too before BlueBit.io. Maybe it won't hurt to buy a $100.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: tokyohd on August 13, 2022, 01:08:55 PMCrypto exchange incorporated in St Vincent and Grenadines, BlueBit.io, which entered the market in spring this year, has listed Shiba Inu, according to a recent tweet of Shannon Bray, a politician, candidate for US Senate from the Libertarian Party who will run an election in November.Read more on U.Today https://u.today/shib-listed-by-yet-another-crypto-exchange-detailsThe Shiba Inu that most people know is one of the meme coins in the market that you can almost find on all the exchange site platforms that have it listed, which is just proof that SHIB is lagging behind when it comes to the volume that it provides on each exchange platform. I just heard about this bluebit and I just now checked it in google search now, and in my opinion this event is in favor of those who believe in SHIB and those who hold it in the long term. I'm not a fan of this token, I only bought it once when I saw that it fell to around 0.000006$ and then when it rose to 0.000013$ I sold it and then until now I didn't buy anymore because I prefer to buy from someone else alts who knows if it's better than SHIB, although I'm not saying this token is ugly, it's always up to you if you want this token.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: I don't think I have ever heard of bluebit. Maybe its quite new and lost in the influx of new exchanges surging into the crypto arena during the now defunct bull run. I hope it survives the current crypto winter. However, I think Shiba Inu is gearing up to be another bitcoin story. Rrnounced and abandoned by the owner and run by the community, with a great followership and great use cases. It surely has a good future

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: Quote from: tokyohd on August 13, 2022, 01:08:55 PMCrypto exchange incorporated in St Vincent and Grenadines, BlueBit.io, which entered the market in spring this year, has listed Shiba Inu, according to a recent tweet of Shannon Bray, a politician, candidate for US Senate from the Libertarian Party who will run an election in November.Read more on U.Today https://u.today/shib-listed-by-yet-another-crypto-exchange-detailsI'm not surprised at all my local exchange just listed Shib when members are requesting top coins like Binance to get listed but the management prefers to list a MEME coin, because of its popularity and the market volume, and of course, its community which is getting bigger, Shib is indeed a breakthrough coin and many are hoping there will be another coin like Shib in the future.

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: Well, good to see it was accepted and listed on another exchange but the question is if people are still buying this meme coin. Because even though it was listed in hundred exchanges but investors had looked into the potentiality of the project, not because it was listed anywhere, even in all exchanges. Might it capture the attention of the community but I was not sure if this creates additional hypes and increase the numbers of its investors. Though I can't assume, I know people are been careful with these meme coins.

comments.author: Mr.sprin
comments.body: The shiba coin is one of the potential coin memes besides doge, although many people think the shiba coin will have no effect even though it has been listed on the exchange but I am very sure of the shiba coin one day many people will regret not investing in shiba coin because one day the news about shiba coin will be good and the price will go up and then people will regret it.

comments.author: Cuda911
comments.body: Shiba inu is the real people's coin, this project is a most have in your wallet forget dogecoin for a while, the massive adoption and strong community love for this project are like no other, why won't I want just a few millions of the token in my wallet.
